title: "Mechanical Dreamscape"
content:
# Mechanical Dreamscape

Welcome to Mechanical Dreamscape, a website dedicated to providing surreal and imaginative wallpapers for your desktop or mobile device. Our collection features unique designs inspired by the world of steampunk and science fiction, with floating objects such as gears, cogs, and computer parts set against muted backgrounds.

Our wallpapers are perfect for those who want to add a touch of creativity and personality to their digital devices. Whether you're a fan of steampunk or just appreciate the beauty of surreal art, our collection has something for everyone.

All of our wallpapers are available for free download in high resolution, so you can enjoy them on any device without sacrificing quality. We update our collection regularly, so be sure to check back often for new and exciting designs.

Thank you for visiting Mechanical Dreamscape, and we hope our wallpapers inspire your imagination and transport you to a world of mechanical wonder.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A surrealist-inspired wallpaper with floating objects such as gears, cogs, and computer parts, against a background of muted colors."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
